comment: Aside from being scatter-brained at times, Prof. Massey is a good professor. He has three projects that determine your entire grade. His classes are basically learning the functionality of Excel and following him along. He is willing to answer the same question multiple times in a row, but after a while he starts to get upset. Overall easy class.

He no longer plans on being a professor but just in case I am leaving a review. I had some basic experience with excel and got a 100% in App Stat through paying attention in class. You can work with others as long as you all do your own work. Very cool guy. If he ever teaches again make sure to take him if you can. You will not regret it.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: The whole class is done on excel, and is an easy 100% if you know the basics of excel. Graded by 3 things, but he gives examples and class time to ask as many questions as you need. Really quick to grade as well. 100% would take again.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: great professor, took him for business statics and got an A. VERY helpful and always wants his students to understand the content, encourages questions, wants you to pass! business statics is typically hard class but he makes it easy. 3 assignments, last two arent easy but he will help you understand them! highly recommend taking him

This professor understands the true purpose of college, or what should be if its not already. His goal is to take problems from the real world, the world he works in everyday, and teach us how to solve them in a professional manner, much like how you would in a real job. No tests, 3 assignments and he holds several review sessions for each one.

You will have 3 assignments that make up all of your grade. The assignments are directly based on the material covered in class. I had him for his first semester and he was a bit disorganized, but he was trying his best. His class is easier than other Stats classes but you have to show up to every class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Massey Is an awesome professor!No homework, quizzes group projects and answers emails pretty quickly. Your grade is determined by three relatively easy excel assignments . His lectures are VERY straight to the point and were EXACTLY like the assignments he assigns. if you follow along in class and ask questions, its impossible to fail.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: First semester teaching, I don't think he had a plan and it showed. Class was disorganized, and we only had 3 grades the entire semester. Every e-mail he sent was him changing parts of the assignment(s) because he "forgot" to tell us something about it. Extremely vague and unhelpful when asked questions. Found him extremely unprofessional

I had Professor Massey during his first semester teaching at KSU. He is a wonderful professor; he is kind and caring towards his students, as well as being tremendously skilled with the material he teaches! He makes himself extremely accessible & is honest with his students. Clear and concise grading and expectations, u will not regret taking him

Professor Massey is awesome! For his very first semester teaching, he did an amazing job! He explains everything so well and provides examples that are helpful for completing the assignments. The assignments are the majority of the grade which I actually like instead of having quizzes, homework, tests, etc. I did not have to buy a textbook either
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT
